We are proud of our record to date across many measures 
of environmental, social and governance domains. 
 ΞWomen make up 57% of Zai Lab team today and 
53.8% of management positions. *
 ΞOur newest corporate office, in Cambridge, 
Massachusetts, is in a building certified LEED Gold 
and our new Suzhou facility, when completed, will be 
GBEL 2-star certified. 
 ΞThe Board Nominating and Governance Committee 
has oversight for ESG matters and we most recently 
appointed a Chief Sustainability Officer to develop 
our ESG strategy. 
*Here refers to director and above positions.
4
